original_title: For King & Country - What Are We Waiting For? - The Worldwide Special
overview: for KING & COUNTRY is bringing their brand new album straight to your living room! Tune in for ‘WHAT ARE WE WAITING FOR?’ THE WORLDWIDE SPECIAL: a global streaming event from the Mojave desert, in partnership with Convoy of Hope in support of Ukrainian refugees. .  Thursday, March 24th at 7PM CT on Facebook and YouTube.
title: For King & Country - What Are We Waiting For? - The Worldwide Special
